name: habitat kitchenette
description: A tiny cooking surface only big enough to fit an induction top, placed above and below many integrated storage units.  The minimal space in which you could technically cook.

name: fridge
description: A compact refrigerator and freezer unit.  Its plugged into a ship's power supply, so it should be expected to work for a very long time.

name: hydraulic cylinder
description: A large cylindrical actuator that extends and retracts the landing gear of the ship.

name: landing skid
description: Retractable landing gear for a spaceship, hydraulically actuated and designed to absorb the impact of landing.
